ygData.subject: RE: Mino horn graphic bugged after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Strange, I noticed that too...but the mino horn didn t used to have a graphic at all on the Avatar screen.  Maybe they meant to use the graphic for the
ygData.messageBody:
> as if it wasn't bad enough that my drum looks like a
> stick. Now,
> after yesterdays patch, equipping a mino horn makes it look
> like I've got a
> small burlap sack attached to my wrist.

Strange, I noticed that too...but the mino horn didn't used to have a
graphic at all on the Avatar screen. Maybe they meant to use the graphic
for the brass horn or something...the wonderful brass horn that we blow into
the wrong end of.

The burlap sack graphic startled me and looks even more weird than the
backward brass horn.

I have an Order of Thunder Medallion that I got from the Qeynos sewers
months ago that I have kept because it had +5CHA +2AC and acts as a
lightstone (lesser). The graphic for that was changed with the patch and
looks much cooler, but when I inspected it the 2 AC points had been nerfed.
This is a LORE, NO DROP, NO TRADE. +5 amulet now - grrrrr, I can't even put
it in the bank.

Enough ranting...those that got nailed on the box of Abu-Kar are much worse
off considering the investment they made on it. I wonder if this was a ploy
to get all the people in the game with too much coin to blow it on the box
only to have it devalued and then resold to the poor people in the game at a
loss to help "balance" the economy? Nahhhh, sounds like I am heading down
conspiracy theory lane and will soon be seeing black helicopters on the
horizon.


- Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci
